6.10.24  4:18 pm   why do i feel like this

      because you can

      chess maybe

6.10.24  3:15 pm   Where is there? When is then?

      right there, .... pretty soon

6.10.24  12:57 pm   What is the meaning behind "Are you a lamb/lamp?" in the damien maymdien video?

      process of elimination

6.10.24  11:26 am   thoughts on jenga

      it's actually harder to put the blocks back in

6.10.24  10:58 am   do you think that everything we do cannot be a product of free will because every action in the universe is predetermined from the courses of all particles that were, are, or will be

      no

6.10.24  10:30 am   how do you feel about shrek the big green ogre

      burger king had green ketchup at one point, that's all i know

6.10.24  7:39 am   it's my birthday, do you think it's impressive that i survived another year on this planet

      yes

6.10.24  4:56 am   is making lists something you've improved on? Or is it a simple thing to do every time

      it can be simple or complex, and i have also improved. in this case, quality is not related to complexity

6.10.24  1:45 am   I want to learn to play the violin, but I'm not currently making money right now. I COULD buy a violin, but I want to start playing once I have consistent income coming in. But then I might not have time to actually learn it. But something in my heart stirs when I hear violin/string music. And I would love to make such strings sing as I imagine them in my head. So what do you think is the best course of action?

      get a cheap violin

6.10.24  12:17 am   here's a picture of a corner of the world:[picture] try to guess where i am base on the picture!

      you are in the center

6.9.24  11:38 pm   Are you more inclined to answer a sincere question over a kinda goobed one or is it just a matter of the ones that call out to you?

      all of these questions are ungoobed. the goobed ones don't even get through

6.9.24  10:07 pm   i'm not dooming myself to only cover/imitate other people's music right?

      right

6.9.24  8:53 pm   what's the darn thing in the box

      camera 2

6.9.24  6:48 pm   would you like some flowers?

      not right now

6.9.24  5:58 pm   As a man, can I give birth to a tree?

      i'm not sure

6.9.24  4:04 pm   is "the ground plane" a pun on how in 3D modeling, you normally use a plane object as the ground?

      indeed that was how the title arose, which came to me many months or years in advance of when the song was really written

6.9.24  3:33 pm   if you were to design a brand new language, would you prefer to develop words that could mean a bunch of things, or prefer designing different words for different things?

      i don't understand the difference between those 2 options you suggested, but if i designed a language it would be naturally be all prepositions

6.9.24  2:28 pm   got any cool feelings to share?

      yes

6.9.24  2:12 pm   in most western cultures, up is good and down is bad. like when something is bad it's ranked low and when something is good it's ranked high.

     i don't buy that. the best ranked item is usually connected to the lowest number (1).

     and also other instances where good is equated with up and bad is equated with down.

     sure, but then there's other instances which go the other way around

      there's some cultures where good is actually down and bad is up but i wonder if they make a list of things from bad to good in like written form do they put all the bad things near the top of the list and then go down as things get better

     what further complicates things is that everything is good and bad

6.9.24  1:49 pm   opinion on iconicness

      that would be iconicity. it used to be considered rare, now it is the default status of every object in the universe

6.9.24  12:07 pm   what makes a town?

      an enclosed or fenced-in space. what you want to do with that is your choice, build a city, do some gardening, ..... whatever

6.9.24  11:11 am   what are you working on at the moment?

      a few things

6.9.24  7:09 am   What does the experience of your role in this questions page do for you?

      it calms me down

6.9.24  5:15 am   how do I create something original? is original even a thing

      sure. that's something you've done that no one has really quite done before like that

6.9.24  2:10 am   How far would you go?

      it's only ever possible to get 50% of the way, because of the way the way changes

6.9.24  2:03 am   Are you a philosopher?

      i was hoping to become an aspiring philosopher

6.9.24  1:09 am   What's wrong with you

      sometimes i forget the difference between 'waxing' and 'waning'

6.9.24  12:05 am   is avoiding the hideous vocal crack that happens near the top of my normal voice range something that can be trained? or is that part of my range always gonna sound bad? is it a matter of how much volume/air i use? you sing some pretty high notes in fly around (in the chorus and then in the even higher part) and they aren't very high, and i can follow along to the whole song except my voice cracks during the chorus, and then it's even worse in the even higher part. i really want to learn how to sing and be confident about it but i feel like a fish out of water

      if you do some singing for a few days in a row i think that will go away

6.8.24  11:06 pm   There is ongoing debate as to whether the art and the artist should remain separate. I believe the two should never be separated, but I think that's the wrong question. People should be asking whether the audience should be separate from the art. I think they should. What do you think?

      this question doesn't make much sense on a surface level, but those phrasings tend to, bizarrely, mean something like this: "If an artist does or thinks something we think is bad, should we turn against them as a society? and if so, how much?"
     
      and my answer is no i don't think society should turn against them. i apologize if this does not resemble your original question.
     
     
     just in case, i will answer your original question more directly, by saying that i think an artist will probably be connected to the art while making it, and then they can make a decision whether to release it with their name on it or anonymously. an audience can also choose to remain separate from any piece of art, by simply not viewing it and not going near it

6.8.24  11:05 pm   hey could you give me a cool, non touristy but intriguing spot to check out in nyc? Heading there in a few months. 

      how about walking the entire length of ocean parkway from north to south

6.8.24  10:02 pm   What was it like back in your day?

      there was no such thing as the wheel barrow. you had to just drag a barrow around

6.8.24  9:50 pm   Do u use autotune

      no, but to clarify i will say that i also don't use any other brand of pitch correction

6.8.24  9:21 pm   opinion on socks

      iconic

6.8.24  8:41 pm   how do i learn to tolerate irritating people

      the solution is for you to be anti-irritating, to counter balance it out. this is easier said than done -- actually, what i meant to say is, it's easier done than said

6.8.24  7:40 pm   Why didn't the road cross the chicken?

      it has to do with grammar

6.8.24  7:19 pm   is there a "brunch" but for the time between lunch and dinner? what would you call it?

      lunch

6.8.24  7:17 pm   How to keep all my plants alive?

      have you considered giving birth to more plants

6.8.24  6:05 pm   i am writing a book. how do i know if it is good?

      you can make it good.... if that's even possible

6.8.24  4:57 pm   melody or lyrics first?

      could happen, but it's usually better when it's done all together

6.8.24  4:31 pm   what is your favorite flower 

      combinations of different flowers. that's the only thing that does it for me anymore

6.8.24  4:10 pm   opinion on dragons

      a dragon just doesn't seem like something there would be more than 1 of

6.8.24  2:59 pm   this guy talking about determinism gets me thinking. it is kinda crazy how even though all of our actions are determined by something, we still experience things and create the illusion of decision. that in and of itself makes me think that it can't all be deterministic

      i have no idea why determinism became so popular recently. i actually thought science was way beyond that already, ever since those electrons refused to decide where they were

6.8.24  2:28 pm   In hindsight, what is your perception on the concept of retrospect, speculatively?

      i think it looks Latin

6.8.24  1:43 pm   Do you ever think that a tree is a lot of processes/verbs all happening at once?
Perhaps all humans, or even all life, is this as well. Thoughts?

      yes, that seems realistic

6.8.24  1:42 pm   What is the explanation for the big bang in the least amount of words?

      'hi'

6.8.24  11:31 am   if you were to make an album out of your pre existing songs, what would the tracklist be?

      it could be done in many different ways

6.8.24  6:32 am   Do you like math?

      it seems to like me

6.8.24  2:43 am   Is birdsong microtonal?

      even better, there is free range of pitch. it's a voice (vocal)

6.8.24  2:15 am   I'm nervous about my internship. What should I do?

      how about doing some additional internships, thus to raise your total number of internships that you are doing
